src

Class ConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.ConfigLoader

  • public class ConfigLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the set of events to be loaded in the EventClock, and behaviour control variables - for example, play sound at pop-ups-. This class give access to the configuration variables, and executes the loading process of the eventes in the EventClock.

    • Field Summary

      List of events to be scheduled/deployed.

      Establish behaviour of clocks when Pause button is pressed.
      (package private) boolean playSound
      Establishes if sound shall be played when pop-ups appear.
      (package private) boolean popUpInFront
      Establishes if pop-up shall be brought to the front when appears.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Field Detail

      • eventList

        java.util.ArrayList<Event> eventList
        List of events to be scheduled/deployed. Events in the list will be the ones loaded in the EventClock, and thus, scheduled and deployed during its working time (showed in the pop-ups, and so on).

      • playSound

        boolean playSound
        Establishes if sound shall be played when pop-ups appear. If true, when pop-up appears a simple sound shall be played.

      • popUpInFront

        boolean popUpInFront
        Establishes if pop-up shall be brought to the front when appears. If true, when pop-up appears it shall be brought to foreground.

      • pauseClocks

        boolean pauseClocks
        Establish behaviour of clocks when Pause button is pressed. If true, when Pause button is pressed, both Event Clock and Worked Time clocks are paused. If false, only Event Clock is paused, while Worked Time clock continues executing its operations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigLoader

        public ConfigLoader()
        Creates configuration initialized with default values.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDefaultEvents

        public void loadDefaultEvents()
        Creates and loads the set of default events. Default set of events are hardcoded and are always available in the application. They have been designed following ergonomic researchs.

      • loadCustomEvents

        public void loadCustomEvents(java.util.ArrayList<Event> customEventList)
        Loads a set of events created by the user (customized ones). Custom events has been created previously and stored in a valid configuration file.
        Parameters:
        customEventList - list of custom events to be loaded.

      • getEventList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getEventList()
        Returns:
        copy of the list of events.

      • getPlaySound

        public boolean getPlaySound()
        Returns:
        playSound value.

        public boolean getPopUpInFront()
        Returns:
        popUpInFront value.

        public boolean getPauseClocks()
        Returns:
        pauseClocks value.

      • setPlaySound

        public void setPlaySound(boolean playSound)
        Sets playSound value.
        Parameters:
        playSound - value to assign to playSound variable.

      • setPopUpInFront

        public void setPopUpInFront(boolean popUpInFront)
        Sets popUpInFront value.
        Parameters:
        popUpInFront - value to assign to playSound variable.

      • setPauseClocks

        public void setPauseClocks(boolean pauseClocks)
        Sets pauseClocks value.
        Parameters:
        pauseClocks - value to assign to the variable.
